attributes.action: Don't detroy our remaining democracy by making the House of Lords an elected chamber
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have seen how party poilitics in the elected House of Commons has destroyed democracy and replaced it with blind party loyalty and how personal conscience is subordinated to the demands of the party; how the need to be elected is of more importance than what is good for the country. The House of Lords should be largely appointed with represntatives coming from the Judiciary, charities, major religions, the TUC and the Institute of Directors etc. This would be more represntative of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
